heading: I'm interested in a lifetime account.
description: Of course you are! It's an incredible deal. Pay once, and access the entire Laracasts catalog (including all future content) FOREVER. Seriously. Learn more here.

heading: May I pay with Paypal?
description: For various reasons, Paypal is not a natively supported option at Laracasts. However, if Paypal is the only way for you to sign up, you can pay for one year's worth of access here.

heading: I have a question about business/team accounts.
description: Great. It's fairly simple. Team accounts are billed at a rate of $149 per developer, per year. Want to register a 25-developer team? That'll be $3,725 for a year's worth of unlimited Laracasts access. You can register directly through our website, or contact us to arrange a PO. Learn more here.

heading: I have a code-related question.
description: Don't we all. However, please use the Laracasts forum for any code-related questions you have. That's what it was made for.

heading: We're interested in advertising with you.
description: Great! Let's talk. We offer a variety of advertising possibilities, and would be a great fit for businesses targeting the Laravel space. Use the contact form on this page to start the conversation.
